title: Liberation theology and Latin American clergy

content.question:
“The poor live their Christian faith and proclaim their hope in the midst of inhuman misery and poverty, resulting from above all the unjust social structures that favor a privileged minority.”

Gustavo Guitiérrez, Peruvian priest and founder of the liberation theology movement, 1985

Which of the following examples best represents the philosophy of liberation theology as expressed by Guitiérrez in the passage above?

choices.label: Latin American Communist leaders redistributed land to their poorest citizens.
Latin American religious clergy fought for economic and social justice.
Latin American churches promoted material wealth for their faithful congregants.
Latin American governments guaranteed freedom of religion for their citizens.

content.answer: Latin American religious clergy fought for economic and social justice.
